command.name: Reboot()
command.description: Reboot the entity associated with the containing {{object}}.

command.name: FactoryReset()
command.description: Factory reset the entity associated with the containing {{object}}.

command.name: Download()
command.description: Download a file to the entity associated with the containing {{object}}. {{issue|Need to include all necessary normative text that (for CWMP) is in A.3.2.8.}}

input.description: {{issue|The CWMP ''FileType'' input argument is omitted because it will be implied by the command's location in the data model.}} {{issue|The CWMP ''SuccessURL'' and ''FailureURL'' input arguments are omitted because they are no longer relevant (if they ever were).}}

parameter.name: URL
parameter.description: URL, as defined in {{bibref|RFC3986}}, specifying the source file location...

parameter.name: Username
parameter.description: Username to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server. This string is set to {{empty}} if no authentication is required.

parameter.name: Password
parameter.description: Password to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server. This string is set to {{empty}} if no authentication is required.

parameter.name: FileSize
parameter.description: The size of the file to be downloaded in bytes. The {{param}} argument is intended as a hint to the CPE, which the CPE MAY use to determine if it has sufficient space for the file to be downloaded, or to prepare space to accept the file. ...

parameter.name: TargetFileName
parameter.description: The name of the file to be used on the target file system...

parameter.name: DelaySeconds
parameter.description: This argument has different meanings for Unicast and Multicast downloads...

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: The date and time transfer was started in UTC. The CPE SHOULD record this information and report it in this argument, but if this information is not available, the value of this argument MUST be set to the Unknown Time value.

parameter.name: CompleteTime
parameter.description: The date and time the transfer was fully completed and applied in UTC. This need only be filled in if the transfer has been fully completed and applied. The CPE SHOULD record this information and report it in this argument, but if this information is not available or the transfer has not completed, the value of this argument MUST be set to the Unknown Time value.

object.name: FaultStruct.
object.description: Fault Structure. If the transfer was successful, the {{param|FaultCode}} is set to zero. Otherwise a non-zero {{param|FaultCode}} is specified along with a {{param|FaultString}} indicating the failure reason.

parameter.name: FaultCode
parameter.description: The numerical fault code...

parameter.name: FaultString
parameter.description: A human-readable text description of the fault. This field SHOULD be empty if the FaultCode equals 0 (zero).

command.name: Upload()
command.description: Upload a file from the entity associated with the containing {{object}}. {{issue|Need to include all necessary normative text that (for CWMP) is in A.4.1.5.}}

input.description: {{issue|The CWMP ''FileType'' input argument is omitted because it will be implied by the command's location in the data model.}}

parameter.name: URL
parameter.description: URL, as defined in {{bibref|RFC3986}}, specifying the destination file location...

parameter.name: Username
parameter.description: Username to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server. This string is set to {{empty}} if no authentication is required.

parameter.name: Password
parameter.description: Password to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server. This string is set to {{empty}} if no authentication is required.

parameter.name: DelaySeconds
parameter.description: The number of seconds from the time this method is called to the time the CPE is requested to initiate the upload...

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: The date and time transfer was started in UTC. The CPE SHOULD record this information and report it in this argument, but if this information is not available, the value of this argument MUST be set to the Unknown Time value.

parameter.name: CompleteTime
parameter.description: The date and time the transfer was fully completed and applied in UTC. This need only be filled in if the transfer has been fully completed and applied. The CPE SHOULD record this information and report it in this argument, but if this information is not available or the transfer has not completed, the value of this argument MUST be set to the Unknown Time value.

object.name: FaultStruct.
object.description: Fault Structure. If the transfer was successful, the {{param|FaultCode}} is set to zero. Otherwise a non-zero {{param|FaultCode}} is specified along with a {{param|FaultString}} indicating the failure reason.

parameter.name: FaultCode
parameter.description: The numerical fault code...

parameter.name: FaultString
parameter.description: A human-readable text description of the fault. This field SHOULD be empty if the FaultCode equals 0 (zero).

command.name: Install()

parameter.name: URL
parameter.description: The URL, as defined in {{bibref|RFC3986}}, that specifies the location of the DU to be installed...

parameter.name: UUID
parameter.description: The UUID (see {{bibref|RFC4122}}) of the DU to be installed...

parameter.name: Username
parameter.description: Username to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server, if authentication is required.

parameter.name: Password
parameter.description: Password to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server, if authentication is required.

object.name: Operation.{i}.
object.description: The results of Operations performed against DUs. {{issue|Is ''UUID'' a unique key?}}

parameter.name: UUID
parameter.description: The UUID as defined in {{bibref|RFC4122}} of the DU that was created.

parameter.name: DeploymentUnitRef
parameter.description: A reference to the DU that was created.

parameter.name: Version
parameter.description: The version of the DU created. This MUST match the {{param|.SoftwareModules.DeploymentUnit.{i}.Version}} Parameter contained within the instance of the DeploymentUnit that is contained within the {{param|DeploymentUnitRef}} argument.

parameter.name: CurrentState
parameter.description: The current state of the created DU.

enumeration.description: The DU is in an Installed state due to a successful Install.
The DU could not be installed in which case a DU instance MUST NOT be created in the Data Model.

parameter.name: Resolved
parameter.description: Whether or not the DU operation resolved all of its dependencies.

parameter.name: ExecutionUnitRefList
parameter.description: The Execution Units that were created as a result of the DU's installation.

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: The date and time transfer was started in UTC. The CPE SHOULD record this information and report it in this argument, but if this information is not available, the value of this argument MUST be set to the Unknown Time value.

parameter.name: CompleteTime
parameter.description: The date and time the transfer was fully completed and applied in UTC. This need only be filled in if the transfer has been fully completed and applied. The CPE SHOULD record this information and report it in this argument, but if this information is not available or the transfer has not completed, the value of this argument MUST be set to the Unknown Time value.

object.name: Operation.{i}.Fault.
object.description: Fault Structure. If the operation was successful, the {{param|FaultCode}} MUST be zero. Otherwise a non-zero {{param|FaultCode}} is specified along with a {{param|FaultString}} indicating the failure reason.

parameter.name: FaultCode
parameter.description: The numerical fault code...

parameter.name: FaultString
parameter.description: A human-readable text description of the fault. This field SHOULD be empty if the FaultCode equals 0 (zero).

parameter.description: Username to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server, if authentication is required.

parameter.description: Password to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server, if authentication is required.
